Of course, every service hasits own specific installation instructions. Furthermore, you need toinclude your unique identifiers, which then end up in the templates.Not very nice.This application hides the details of the different analytics servicesbehind a generic interface, and keeps personal information andconfiguration out of the templates. Its goal is to make the basicset-up very simple, while allowing advanced users to customize tracking.Each service is set up as recommended by the services themselves, usingan asynchronous version of
